```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data("rest_inspec")

rest_inspec = 
  rest_inspec %>%
  select(
    dba, boro, cuisine_description, inspection_date, grade) %>%
  filter(  
    !is.na(grade),
    grade != "Not Yet Graded",
    cuisine_description == "Chinese",
    format(as.Date(inspection_date, format = "%Y-%m-%d"), "%Y") == "2017"
  ) %>%
  distinct()
  
```


Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
rest_inspec %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~boro, y = ~grade, type = "scatter", mode = "markers",
          color = ~dba, alpha = 0.5)
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}
rest_inspec %>% 
  mutate(boro = fct_reorder(boro, grade)) %>% 
  plot_ly(y = ~grade, color = ~boro, type = "box",
          colors = "Set2")
```

### Chart C

```{r}
rest_inspec %>%
  count(boro) %>%
  mutate(boro = fct_reorder(boro, n)) %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~boro, y = ~n, type = "bar")
```
